price: Bazoba rero bicaye ku bitanda bisharije bitondetse neza. Tuzonabatera iteka Tubashingire abakenyezi bo mu Bwami bw’ijuru, barangwa n’ubwiza bw’akataraboneka (Hururayini).
arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٖ مَّصۡفُوفَةٖۖ وَزَوَّجۡنَٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٖ

meta.transliteration: muttakiīna ʿalā sururin maṣfūfatin wazawwajnāhum biḥūrin ʿīnin
